name: odbc_fetch_into
purpose: Fetch one result row into array

return.description:
Returns the number of columns in the result;
   FALSE on error.

changelog.change:
The result_array and rownumber
        parameters have been swapped. This allows the rownumber to be a constant again.

The rownumber can no longer be passed in as a
        constant, but rather as a variable. This again changed in 4.2.0.

The result_array parameter no longer needs to
        be passed in by reference.
